name: Transporting in State
text: §150A-8  Transporting in State.  Flora and fauna specified by rules and regulations of the department shall not be moved from one island to another island within the State or from one locality to another on the same island except by a permit issued by the department. [L 1973, c 69, pt of §1; am L 1974, c 232, §3; am L 1977, c 114, §3]
